name: Hack_the_Planet.exe
description:
The government is being hacked so many times at once! It's your job to end these hacks, right? Well, the hacking is unstoppable but you can stall it for as long as you can. You will fight 'till death in the program you created to stop the hacks.

Patch 2.0: Added better sprites. Removed copyrighted music & sounds
